items.sentence: Tom locked the car and put the key in his pocket.
Why don\'t you ask Tom to proofread this for you?
Why don\'t you ask your parents to buy you a car?
Why don\'t you come and stay with us next summer?
If anyone calls, tell them I\'ll be back at 2:30.
If questions bother you, don\'t become a teacher.
I\'ll come when I\'ve finished doing my homework.
Mary and the other women left thirty minutes ago.
Mary put the flowers that Tom gave her in a vase.
Tom and Mary celebrated New Year\'s Eve together.
